Subject: Sensitivity Analysis

Hello,
I was wondering if the much-anticipated sensitivity analysis functions 
had been implemented yet, and if so, whether they had made it as far as 
Windows binaries?

Unfortunately I am in somewhat of a hurry, so if it's not ready I will 
resort to changing parameters one at a time and repeating the 
simulation many times. Is this the technique people have used until 
now?

Also I wondered if the Cantera sensitivity analysis will be able to 
determine the sensitivity with respect to species thermochemistry, or 
just with respect to the rate coefficients? I am using a mechanism in 
which many species have poorly known themochemistries, so would be 
interested in the ability to tell which ones really matter.

Many thanks for your excellent work Dave.

Regards,
Richard
